law.catch_line: Noncomplying contract void and unenforceable -- Waiver deemed void.

text.section: Any contract which does not comply with the applicable provisions of KRS 367.900 to 367.930 shall be void and unenforceable as contrary to public policy.
Any waiver by a member or purchaser of a contract of any of the provisions of KRS 367.900 to 367.930 shall be deemed void and unenforceable as contrary to public policy.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 367, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988.
